title: leftypol
hiddenReason: The website is behind a CloudFlare-alike DDoS protection and returns 403 Forbidden for the "demo" CORS proxy, but it is functional when accessed through one's own CORS proxy running at localhost.
description: Leftypol is an imageboard where users can post anonymously.
We engage in both serious political discourse and informal discussion on various topics related to leftist thought.
They are... an interesting group of people -
